title: Hurray!

msg:
Your username has been sent to your email! Click the button below to proceed to the login page:

title: Username sent!

msg:
Thank you for your interest in our study. We will contact you shortly. Meanwhile, you can click the button below to return to the home page:

Return to home page
title: Thank you for your interest!

msg: Thank you for you participation. You have opted out of the follow-up study. You will not be contacted for the follow-up study. You may now close this tab.
title: Thank you for your participation!

msg:
You have completed this session. Click the button below to proceed to the home page:

msg: Thank you for your participation! You may now close this tab. Please refer our study to your friends and family. If they are not on CloudResearch, they can either register on CloudResearch or on our independent registration page: www.imwbs.org
title: Thank you for your participation!
